Anyone else following the demise of wired CCTV systems due to wireless IP systems? I've spent quite a bit of time researching hardware for a six-camera system (little info is available for end-users, it has to be rooted out), purchased those and their accessories and am ready to take a closer look at software. To this point Milestone seems to get the nod, but I'm hoping someone else has gone through the learning curve to save me some time in locating valid resources.

what exactly is the problem and what are you trying to do?
 
 the idea that it is not wired is no big deal...I'll assume you have some sort of encryption on it (not WEP).

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Wireless IP network surveillance software
